name: No Way Back (vereschagin)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.  I made a completely new game. 

Design modifications: 

1.  Created a completely interesting, comprehensive level with collider houses to protect against enemies' bullets. 

2. Created 3 levels with one map and different difficulties. The 1st level has 50 enemies. The 2nd one has 75 enemies. The 3rd is the most difficult level with 150 enemies.  Each type of enemy has its own score value. 

3. Added a new victory screen to the last level. Added the ability to exit the game at any time. 

Aesthetic modifications:

1. Changed all graphics in this project.  

2. Added new 7 types of enemies with their aminations of walk and death. 

3.  Replaced all sound effects. Fire effects, explosions, hit effects, flying, pause, and victory sounds. 

4.  Created (wrote) my custom music for the game using Logic Pro and Adobe Auditions. 

5. Created Hit Effect with particles. 

Gameplay modifications:

1. Set up different abilities for all enemies. Following behavior, Damage, Health. 

2. Added damage for enemies' bullets. 

Credits:

Created by Sergey Vereschagin
